Craig Jamieson Mack (May 10, 1970 na March 12, 2018) bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ. O nyere aka wuo ntọala màkà Bad Boy Records, akara nwere mmetụta na hip hop na ụlọ ọrụ egwu.

A mụrụ ya na The Bronx ma zụlite ya na Long Island, Craig Mack malitere ịgba egwu rap dị ka ónyé nọ n'afọ iri na ụma n'okpuru aha MC EZ wee wepụta otu egwu na 1988, "Just Rhymin'" kwadoro na "Get Retarded", dịka akụkụ nke MC EZ & Troup. Mack wee bụrụ enyi na onye ọrụ hip hop nke Long Island EPMD ma mesịa soro ha gaa njem, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụ ụzọ
Mgbè afọ ole na ole gachara n'enweghị ọganihu n'ọrụ ndekọ ya, Mack jiri ohere rap maka Sean Combs, wee nwéta nkwekọrịta ndekọ na akara ọhụrụ nke Combs, Bad Boy
A maara Mack nke ọma màkà egwu ya nke afọ 1994, "Flava in Ya Ear".
E wepụtara egwu mbụ ya "Get Retarded/Just Rhymin'" n'okpuru aha MC EZ na 1988 na Fresh Records
A maara Mack nke ọma màkà egwu egwu ya nke afọ 1994 "Flava In Ya Ear", nke e wepụtara n'okpuru ezigbo aha ya

Remix nke egwu ahụ bụ ngosipụta nke The Notorious B.I.G., yana otu n'ime ngosipụta mbụ nke Busta Rhymes. Ọ bụ ezie na Mack bụ ónyé na-eti egwu mbụ wepụtara egwu na Bad Boy Records, ihe ịga nke ọma nke The Notorious B.I.G.'s debut album Ready to Die, nke wepụtara kpọmkwem ụbọchị asaa tupu Mack's debut album Project Funk da World, kpuchiri ihe ịga nke a ma ama na ákàrà ahụ.
